entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Prince George
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:31 PM PST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mist, -28.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Prince George Airport 11:49 PM PST Thursday 23 February 2023
Condition: Mist
Temperature: -28.8°C
Pressure: 103.4 kPa
Visibility: 2.8 km
Humidity: 78 %
Dewpoint: -31.5°C
Wind: 0 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 1

entry.title: Thursday night: Clear. Low minus 30.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 30. Wind chill minus 24 this evening and minus 35 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 16. POP 60%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 60 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Wind becoming south 20 km/h early in the afternoon. High minus 16. Wind chill minus 36 in the morning and minus 24 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 16.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning late in the evening. Amount 5 cm. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Temperature steady near minus 16. Wind chill minus 27 in the evening and minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Thursday 23 February 2023
